languages.text: "Что касается инцидентов, имевших место на Футфоле, то Наместник Токара уже передал нам, что пострадавшие не имеют претензий и благодарят Вашу Светлость за честь быть свидетелями развлечений Вольного Торговца и {mf|его|ее} очаровательной подруги".

"Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know that the persons affected have no claims against you and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} charming paramour amuse themselves."
languages.original_text: "Что касается инцидентов, имевших место на Футфоле, то Наместник Токара уже передал нам, что пострадавшие не имеют претензий и благодарят Вашу Светлость за честь быть свидетелями развлечений Вольного Торговца и {mf|его|ее} очаровательной подруги".

traits.locale_text: "Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know the persons affected have no claims and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} captivating paramour amuse themselves."

"Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know the persons affected have no claims and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} captivating paramour amuse themselves."

"Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know that the persons affected have no claims and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} charming paramour amuse themselves."

"Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know that the persons affected have no claims and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} charming paramour amuse themselves."

"Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know that the persons affected have no claims against you and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} charming paramour amuse themselves."

"Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know that the persons affected have no claims against you and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} charming paramour amuse themselves."

languages.text: « Concernant les incidents ayant eu lieu à Castel, le suzerain Tocara nous a déjà fait savoir que les personnes affectées n'ont pas de réclamations contre vous. Elles remercient d'ailleurs Votre Seigneurie de l'honneur qu'elle leur a fait de montrer comment {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} et sa charmante compagne savent se divertir. »
languages.original_text: "Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know that the persons affected have no claims against you and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} charming paramour amuse themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Concernant les incidents ayant eu lieu à Castel, le suzerain Tocara nous a déjà fait savoir que les personnes affectées n'ont pas de réclamations. Elles remercient d'ailleurs Votre Seigneurie pour l'honneur qu'elle leur a fait de montrer combien {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} et sa charmante compagne ont pu se divertir. »

languages.text: “至于发生在落脚港的事情，托卡拉总督告知我们，那些受到影响的人不仅没有向您进行索赔，还感谢大人您让他们有幸目睹，行商浪人与{mf|他|她}妩媚的情人是如何消遣的。”
languages.original_text: "Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know that the persons affected have no claims against you and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} charming paramour amuse themselves."

traits.locale_text: “至于发生在落脚港的事情，托卡拉总督告知我们，那些受到影响的人不仅没有进行索赔，还感谢大人您让他们有幸目睹，行商浪人与{mf|他|她}妩媚的情人是如何消遣的。”

languages.text: "Was die Vorfälle auf Footfall angeht, Lehnsherr Tocara hat uns bereits unterrichtet, dass die betroffenen Personen keinerlei Beschwerden gegen Euch haben und Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} für die Ehre danken, miterlebt haben zu dürfen, wie sich {mf|der Freihändler und seine|die Freihändler und ihre} bezaubernde Begleitung amüsieren."
languages.original_text: "Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know that the persons affected have no claims against you and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} charming paramour amuse themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Was die Vorfälle auf Footfall angeht, Lehnsherr Tocara hat uns bereits unterrichtet, dass die betroffenen Personen keinerlei Beschwerden haben und Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} für die Ehre danken, miterlebt haben zu dürfen, wie sich {mf|der Freihändler und seine|die Freihändler und ihre} bezaubernde Begleitung amüsieren."

languages.text: «En cuanto a lo ocurrido en Paso, el Señor Tocara nos ha informado de que las personas afectadas no tienen ninguna queja al respecto y le agradecen al Comerciante Independiente el honor de verl{mf|os|as} a usted y a su encantadora amante disfrutando junt{mf|os|as}».
languages.original_text: "Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know that the persons affected have no claims against you and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} charming paramour amuse themselves."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a lo ocurrido en Paso, el señor Tocara nos ha informado de que las personas afectadas no tienen ninguna queja al respecto y le agradecen al Comerciante Independiente el honor de verl{mf|os|as} a usted y a su encantadora amante disfrutando junt{mf|os|as}».

languages.text: 「フットフォールで発生した出来事に関して、領主トカラは既に私たちに連絡しており、影響を受けた人々は何もあなたに主張せず、自由開拓者とその魅力的な愛人が楽しむ様を目撃する栄誉を陛下に感謝しております」
languages.original_text: "Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know that the persons affected have no claims against you and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} charming paramour amuse themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールで発生した出来事に関して、領主トカラは既に私たちに連絡しており、影響を受けた人々は何もあなたに主張せず、自由開拓者とその魅力的な愛人が楽しむ様を目撃する栄誉を陛下に感謝しております」

languages.text: "Şimdi de Binliman'da yaşanan olaylara geçelim. Emîr Tocara, yaşananlardan etkilenen kişilerin size karşı herhangi bir suç duyurusunda bulunmayacağını belirtti. Ayrıca ona, bir Hür Tacir'in ve çekici âşığının hoş zaman geçirişine şahit olma onurunu bahşettiği için {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne teşekkür etti."
languages.original_text: "Regarding the incidents that took place on Footfall, Liege Tocara has already let us know that the persons affected have no claims against you and thank Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for the honour of witnessing how the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} charming paramour amuse themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'da yaşanan olaylara geçersek, Emîr Tocara, yaşananlardan etkilenen kişilerin size karşı herhangi bir suç duyurusunda bulunmayacağını belirtti ve ona, bir Hür Tacir'in ve onun çekici âşığının nasıl hoş zaman geçirdiğine şahit olma onuru bahşettiği için {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne teşekkür etti."
